explains: adj. 波涛汹涌的；波浪起伏的；不断改变方向的

sentences.en: A gale was blowing and the sea was choppy.
sentences.cn: 大风吹来，海面上碧波荡漾。

sentences.en: Highly leveraged funds sink quickly in such choppy markets.
sentences.cn: 高级杠杆基金很快陷入这样的牛皮市中。

sentences.en: All these events toss the mind like a boat on a choppy ocean.
sentences.cn: 所有这些折磨着脑袋，就如小船在大洋风浪中般无助。
